resources.string: Your session has expired, please sign in again!

Why do I need to sign in to a service?

Allow the user to view on a map
Unchecking this means users will only know their current proximity to the target
Choose the maximum and minimum number of markers for the user to place on the map. To allow an unlimited number of markers, set the maximum as \'0\'.
Limit users to only placing markers on their current, physical location
The minimum number of map markers has to be at least 1!
The maximum number of map markers must be greater or equal to the minimum number!

Require that users enter their name(s)
By making an activity public, you\'re allowing anyone else to be able to find and use it. Untick this if you only want to share it privately.
This is useful if you expect several users to be sharing devices and/or accounts

If your activity relies on the user being in a specific place, add it here.

Do you want to start this activity, or remove it from your recently used section?
This activity was created using a more recent version of OurPlace, so it can\'t be opened. Please download the most recent version and try again!
Do you want to share your work with {0}, the creator of this activity?
Name entry required for this activity
Congratulations! You\'ve arrived at the target location!
Why do I need to log into OurPlace through another service?

OurPlace uses other social media services to authenticate user accounts through a secure process called OAuth. This lets our users create and sign into accounts, without needing to think up and remember yet another password. It also means you don\'t have to trust us with keeping any passwords safe - we never receive one! You just sign in with a service you likely already have an account for. This makes things easier and more secure for both of us.
What information does OurPlace take from these services?

We take the minimum amount of information from your social media account in order to provide a good service. We don\'t have access to your friends lists, and we can\'t and won\'t post things on your behalf. We simply store your name, date of birth, a link to your profile picture and your email address.
Why do you need this information and how will it be used?

We need an email address to be able to identify you across services. If, for example, you signed into OurPlace with a Google account and then the next week signed in using Facebook, we could see that you\'re the same person thanks to the matching email address. We will not share any of your details with third parties and we will not spam your email account. The other basic profile information is used to personalise your OurPlace experience and help us keep track of how the service is being used.
Find and scan the QR code
The maximum number of activities to be stored at once for offline use
Delete all downloaded activities from the local storage. They can be downloaded again, but any progress (including created photos, video etc) you have made in them will be lost.
This will delete any unfinished progress you have made in downloaded activities. Are you sure you want to continue?
This will delete any progress you haven\'t uploaded yet
This will delete all data and files you haven\'t yet uploaded. Are you sure you want to continue?
